name: get_profile_by_slug
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool is_this_coin_a_scam.
Tool description: Get access to real-time data on all major cryptocurrencies, including ratings, red flags, trending analytics, community metrics and more.
API description: Fetch a specific coin profile by its slug, optionally including various additional details.

slug.description: The slug identifier for the cryptocurrency.

explorers.description: If True, includes the list of blockchain explorers for the coin. Defaults to None.

community.description: If True, includes community metrics related to the coin. Defaults to None.

repo.description: If True, includes source code repository stats related to the coin. Defaults to None.

contracts.description: If True, includes smart contract and audit details related to the coin. Defaults to None.

news.description: If True, includes the latest 5 news stories related to the coin. Defaults to None.

flags.description: If True, includes red flags associated with the coin. Defaults to None.

exchanges.description: If True, includes the list of exchanges where the coin is traded. Defaults to None.

links.description: 'true' if you want to display the link to social media and project websites and artifacts

tags.description: If True, includes tags related to the coin. Defaults to None.
